subject: Football
College Athletics
Civil War (US) (1861-65)
lead_paragraph: The annual football game between the Kansas Jayhawks and the Missouri Tigers, to be played Saturday night, taps into a mutual animosity born of a flashpoint in American history.
snippet: The annual football game between the Kansas Jayhawks and the Missouri Tigers, to be played Saturday night, taps into a mutual animosity born of a flashpoint in American history.
